735270.name: Sky Force Reloaded - Original Soundtrack
735270.description:
Soundtrack from Sky Force Reloaded. Contains original tracks composed by Jacek Dojwa, their remastered versions arranged by Adam Skorupa and new tracks composed by Adam Skorupa.

Track List

  • 01. In-Game 1 (2:03)
  • 02. In-Game 2 (2:20)
  • 03. In-Game 3 (2:01)
  • 04. In-Game 4 (2:07)
  • 05. Boss Fight (1:00)
  • 06. Menu Track (1:08)
  • 07. In-Game 1 - 2006 (1:24)
  • 08. In-Game 2 - 2006 (1:41)
  • 09. In-Game 3 - 2006 (1:38)
  • 10. Boss Fight - 2006 (0:45)
  • 11. Menu Track - 2006 (1:16)

All tracks are 320 kbps stereo MP3, with original channel separation for the 2006's versions.
Included is a *.MOD file containing all the original tracks (requires a MOD plugin to be played).
735270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
